participant_1.background:
I have several barn cats, they are a great source of entertainment when I'm not feeling productive.
i am not really a blond.
I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.
i hope to travel the world one day.
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to be more mindful of my reactions and to find healthier ways to cope with stress.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i got engaged to be married in paris , france.
My most difficult decision was whether to follow my dreams or to stay in a stable job.
I'm trying to make my parents proud by singing to their clients, but it's not easy.

content.text: I just got back from an early morning walk through Central Park.
How was it? I love Central Park!
It was great! The weather was perfect and it was so peaceful.
I agree! It's the perfect place to clear your head.
I do it everyday to start my day off right.
That's a great idea! I should start doing that too.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my friends and family.
Me too! I love to read and go for walks. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially into historical fiction and thrillers.
I love historical fiction too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really love The Pillars of the Earth by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great read.
